law.catch_line: Seals and markings of Division of Emergency Management to be affixed on vehicles used and operated by division.
law.text: In lieu of the official seal of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, the division shall be authorized to design, display and affix the distinctive seal and markings of the Division of Emergency Management on any and all state vehicles owned, leased, or operated by the division for official purposes and operated by personnel of the division.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 115, effective July 15, 1998.
